abstract.t: This document specifies how to use Extensible Authentication Protocol(EAP) in HIP to incorporate user authentication in the IPsec tunnelcreation. This document describes two new parameters fortransporting EAP messages inside HIP control packets. The main focusof this document is to describe how to use these parameters tocombine needed EAP negotiation in order to authenticate the user.This document also describes how on-path middleboxes can take part inthe negotiation as authenticators.
